Control.ttp: frThis page provides information related to Internet Settings.

Control.lbl: frBypass proxy server for local addresses:
Control.ttp: frSynchronize the date and time on the device with the date and time on my computer.
frChecked indicates that Proxy is enabled on this device.
frClick to display online help related to this page...
frClick to open the print dialog for sending the contents of this page to the default printer...
frClick to refresh the contents of this page...

Messages.Message: fr'Internet Proxy Host' minimum length is 4.
fr'Internet Proxy Host' is required when Access the Internet using a proxy server contains a 'checkmark'.
fr'Internet Proxy Port' minimum length is 2.
fr'Internet Proxy Port' is required when Access the Internet using a proxy server contains a 'checkmark'.
